entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat. He was described as boring and useless by Ron, but Harry is sure Ron would be miserable if Scabbers died.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts. He has a pet rat named Scabbers and is often complaining about it.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is Hermione's cat. It was trying to eat Scabbers, which made Ron angry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts. She has a pet cat named Crookshanks and was furious with Ron for trying to kick it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts. He brought the Firebolt down to the common room and was examining it.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is a broom that Harry has. Hermione looked darkly at it as though it too had been criticizing her cat.

relationships.description: Ron owns Scabbers, his pet rat. He was described as being very attached to it.
Hermione owns Crookshanks, her cat. It was trying to eat Scabbers, which made Ron angry.
Harry possesses the Firebolt, a broom that he brought down to the common room and was examining.
